In this role, you will be responsible for managing day-to-day client relations, supporting the execution of communication strategies, and helping deliver impactful campaigns that enhance our clients’ public image and media presence.

title: Program Manager

Strong networks in civil society
Strategic thinking and teamwork
Egyptian nationality required

title: National UN Volunteer – Project Assistant
description: Support in project administration, logistics, and documentation related to development programs.

title: Project Coordinator – ILO (Subject To Funding)
description: Responsible for project implementation, coordination, planning, monitoring, and reporting in line with donor requirements and organizational standards.
requirements: Experience in project management, preferably in education or employment-related programs.

title: Project Specialist – SWEET Project (Gender & Women Economic Empowerment)
description: Implement and monitor the SWEET project focusing on gender and women's economic empowerment, coordinate with stakeholders, and contribute to program development and evaluation.
requirements: Experience in project implementation, monitoring and evaluation, stakeholder coordination, and a background in gender and women's empowerment programs.
skills: Project Implementation, Monitoring and Evaluation, Stakeholder Coordination, Gender Empowerment

title: Senior Field Coordinator
description: Support the implementation of girls' empowerment programs across 27 governorates, coordinate with civil society and government partners, assess needs, implement capacity-building initiatives, and develop field monitoring plans.
requirements: Experience in program coordination, stakeholder engagement, capacity building, and field monitoring in community development or gender empowerment programs.
skills: Program Coordination, Stakeholder Engagement, Capacity Building, Field Monitoring, Community Development

title: Commercial Executive
description: Handle commercial and clerical tasks, including communication, documentation, and coordination with stakeholders.
requirements: Graduation, preferably in Economics/Commerce, proficiency in English and Arabic, good computer skills (Microsoft Office, Outlook, Internet, Social Media, PDF conversion), and typing speed over 30 wpm in English.
skills: Economics, Commerce, Bilingual Communication, Computer Proficiency, Typing

title: Administrative Staff
description: Manage official vehicle arrangements, supervise drivers, handle correspondence with the Egyptian Foreign Ministry, process shipments, assist in recruitment and HR procedures, manage airport operations for diplomats, and provide basic IT support.
requirements: Fluency in Arabic and English, experience in administrative or logistical roles, strong organizational and communication skills, IT proficiency, and familiarity with embassy operations are pluses.
skills: Administration, Logistics, Communication, IT Support, Embassy Operations

title: Project Officer (Green and Sustainable Transition)
description: Responsible for advising on policy and managing programs related to the Green Transition, including energy, water, environment, and climate action. Tasks include policy dialogue, sector analysis, program management, and stakeholder coordination.
requirements: Experience in program management, policy analysis, and coordination with stakeholders in the fields of energy, environment, or climate action.
skills: Program Management, Policy Analysis, Stakeholder Engagement, Renewable Energy, Environmental Policy
